alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox; Peoria (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 8:21PM CDT until May 07 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL FULTON...SOUTHEASTERN KNOX AND NORTHWESTERN PEORIA COUNTIES... At 821 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Trivoli, or 13 miles northeast of Canton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Peoria. This includes the following highways... Interstate 474 near mile marker 0. Interstate 74 between mile markers 64 and 86. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
